com.pi4j.jni

Class SerialInterruptEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • com.pi4j.jni.SerialInterruptEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class SerialInterruptEvent
extends EventObject

    This class provides the event object for Serial interrupt data receive event.

    Author:
    Robert Savage (http://www.savagehomeautomation.com)
    See Also:
    http://www.pi4j.com/, Serialized Form
